doc:
Andrea Habay https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andrea_Habay 0 Andrea Habay (1883–1941) was a French film actor. Habay appeared in more forty films during the silent era, mostly in Italy. He also directed three films during the early 1920s. He played the role of Petronius in the 1924 epic Quo Vadis, one of his final films. Andrea_Habay ( 1883 – 1941 ) was a_French_film_actor . Habay appeared in more_forty_films during the_silent_era , mostly in Italy . He also directed three_films during the_early_1920s . He played the_role of Petronius in the_1924_epic_Quo_Vadis , one of his_final_films .
